objects.name: Analytic 0800
objects.description: Correlates suspicious removal or modification of the com.apple.quarantine extended attribute, manipulation of LSFileQuarantineEnabled values in Info.plist, and unexpected process execution of unsigned or non-notarized binaries. Also monitors abnormal trust validation failures in unified logs and unusual activity in QuarantineEvents database entries.

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: xattr -d com.apple.quarantine or similar attribute removal commands

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Trust validation failures or bypass attempts during notarization and code signing checks

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: macos:osquery
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Changes to LSFileQuarantineEnabled field in Info.plist

x_mitre_mutable_elements.description: Legitimate enterprise update tools or deployment frameworks that may strip quarantine flags
Baseline trusted Apple Developer IDs and enterprise certs used for code signing
Time correlation window for xattr modification followed by suspicious process execution
